column4: I killed the window but the firefox process is still running and 44% of memory..
When I try to kill it using top with the PID nothing happens
can you give a pastebin of the output of: ps -ef | grep -i fire     Thanks
tried chromium? especialy the daily build?
Chromium works for most everything, except sites using http auth (like our internal site)
yes, will kill any users processes
it's also the parent of plugin containier, so that should die too
then try:  sudo kill -9 12922    then rerun:  ps -ef | grep -i fire   fo make sure that has gone
plugin is gone, still can't kill 12828
I can't think of a bigger hammer than -9
